PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-10432024-09-20INFC
ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisAppointment of MARIE ANTOINETTE CAMPAGNA of LaSalle, Ontario, to be Chairperson of the Windsor-Detroit Bridge Authority, on an interim basis, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year, or until such time as a new Chairperson is appointed, whichever occurs first.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of MARIE ANTOINETTE CAMPAGNA of LaSalle, Ontario, to be Chairperson of the Windsor-Detroit Bridge Authority, on an interim basis, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year, or until such time as a new Chairperson is appointed, whichever occurs first.
